ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] good news!
ygData.msgSnippet: As I ve stated many times on this list: Lyrnia Jongleur:  Level 34 bard - Veeshan Lyrnia Windsong:  Level 30 Bard - Beta Lyrnali Windsinger:  Level 50 Bard -
ygData.messageBody:
As I've stated many times on this list:

Lyrnia Jongleur: Level 34 bard - Veeshan
Lyrnia Windsong: Level 30 Bard - Beta
Lyrnali Windsinger: Level 50 Bard - Test

And you have taken my statement completely out of context. Did I say
camping? I said hunting. Just because a group is "pulling" doesn't mean
they're camping. Pulling is the first step in breaking an area to penetrate
it. Just go to a plane raid if you don't agree. You'll see.

No this wasn't flame bait. But you outright dissed the idea of an upgraded
charm song. With Lullaby broken and Pixie Strike about 50% reliable Charm
is one of our _best_ crowd control songs. Also, in the expansion there will
be high level outdoor zones as well. Charm will be very useful there if we
get an upgrade. I don't know about you but I don't _always_ want to group.
Charm gives us a nice ability to solo which is different from fear/chain or
fear/snare.

If you insist on getting angry everytime someone points out a flaw in your
logic then you are bound to be miserable.

Lyrnia Jongleur
----- Original Message -----
From: <kevikazzam@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 22, 2000 6:59 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] good news!


> From: kevikazzam@...
>
> In a message dated 3/22/00 4:34:54 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Lyrnia@...
> writes:
>
> << I really hate it when a bard who hasn't explored all the uses for the
more
> powerful songs we get disses one as "it's not useful". >>
>
> I really hate it when a bard doesn't know another bard and assumes things,
in
> turn making themselves look foolish.
>
> I have used charm extensively, but now being 50 i hardly ever use it.
Bats/
> bugs etc aren't charmable, and now guk is a joke. I haven't been back
there
> in months. Sure, upgraded song would allow us to charm higher level
things,
> but I am hoping for all new songs, not just rehashes. But oh well,
replying
> to this is pretty pointless. . I love how because I post my views on how I
> would like to play in the expansion it is "wrong". I think your post is
> obvious flame bait. What level are you ? sign your posts please, I
honestly
> don't know how to reply seeing as I have no idea where you are coming
from.
> Bleh , go camp something , that seems to be what makes you happy.
> Fine, I was just saying I would like songs with both form and function. I
> don't play to camp anymore, I play for friends, for raids, and to help out
> lower level people. I will prolly stay on longer if at least a couple of
our
> songs had some sort of RP applicable aspect to them ( the illusion one
being
> a great one ) but I doubt you know what RP is , nor have any interest in
it.
> Good luck , get 50 ( you win ! ) then get 60 ( you win ! ) then
quit
> and go back to Quake.
>
> Ulaien Firsesong
> "this is not helping my faith in sticking around in this game"
> 50 bard tunare.
>
